channel.title: Client running help for 317 server! please help
channel.description:
every time i try run the client it doesnt work i have this problem with most servers it says things like "error could not find main class client" "exception in main class java......"
i have now got the client running but when i try log in it freezes and says this RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Java Sound Sequencer" java.lang.IllegalStateException: Rece iver is not open at com.sun.media.sound.SoftReceiver.send(Unknown Source) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice$TransmitterList.sendMessage(Un known Source) at com.sun.media.sound.RealTimeSequencer$DataPump.notesOff(Unknown Sourc e) at com.sun.media.sound.RealTimeSequencer$PlayThread.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
thank you!

item.title: Client running help for 317 server! please help
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

erlasz:

“error could not find main class client”

Try editing the Batch file and adding “-cp .;” before the class.

EDIT: Wrong section - Client Help.

Read full topic
